column5: hey guys, things have been hot here in the sault and it doesnt look like alot of rain in the forecast. now with that being said things are gonna get dry and that means fires. does anyone have any links with up to date news on fire bans in ontario? thanks
MNR has a listing of fire bans and current burning fires  http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business/AFFM/...age/240351.html
